name: mock-server
description: Customize Your Own Dynamic Local Mock Server

mock-server.settings.port.description: Set custom port to generate local mock server

mock-server.settings.baseUrl.description: Set custom base url. This url will be added as a prefix to every routes

rootPath.description: Set custom root path. Note : every other paths given in will be relative to this root path

mockPath.description: Set mock Path to generate local mock server. Note : If the path points to a folder, the mock will be generated for every json files inside the given folder

envPath.description: Set custom environment data folder Path. Note : The .json files inside the folder will be listed down for switching environment using `Switch environment` command

middlewarePath.description: Provide the middleware.js path. Note: the js file must have an default module export of the middleware

staticPath.description: Every file under tis folder will be hosted in a localhost

mock-server.settings.paths.description: set paths to start the mock server

mock-server.settings.store.description: Provide any store values before starting the server

mock-server.settings.excludeRoutes.description: Provide list of routes to exclude form generate local server that matches this route

mock-server.settings.excludeOldRoutes.description: If true, it excluded the old routes which are rewritten using routeRewrite

mock-server.settings.routesToLoop.description: Provide list of routes to loop form generate mock that matches this route

mock-server.settings.routesToGroup.description: Provide list of routes to group form generate mock that matches this route

mock-server.settings.reverseRouteOrder.description: If true, routes will be generated in a reverse order

mock-server.settings.statusBar.show.description: Change this to false if you don't want the button to show in statusbar

mock-server.settings.statusBar.position.description: Set a custom position of the statusbar. Note: Please reload the extension to take effect.

mock-server.settings.statusBar.priority.description: helps to reorder the placement of the statusbar. Minimum priority moves the statusbar to left most. Note: Please reload the extension to take effect.

mock-server.settings.donotShowInfoMsg.description: Change this to true if you don't want to show information pop up messages.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
